Trigger.name: Roar
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "You" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then -- system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^A terrible cold fills your chest, constricting your lungs\. (You)r mouth falls open and an unearthly, terrible roar emanates forth at (.+)\.$
^The mouth of (\w+) falls open as \w+ eyes grow unfocused, and \w+ directs a terrible, unearthly roar at (.+)\.$
